channel.title: Never seen client run error?
channel.description:
My run.batch edit looks like:
@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m client pause
Registry key 'Software\JavaSoft\Java Runtime Environment\CurrentVersion' has value '1.7', but '1.6' is required. Error: could not find java.dll Error: could not find Java SE Runtime Environment. Press any key to continue . . .
I have both jre 6/7 ....
===========edit=============== I re-downloaded JAVA and I still have the same problem =.=
WTFFFFFFF :'[

item.title: Never seen client run error?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Make sure you have set-up your CLASSPATH correctly.

"I have both jre 6/7 … " What about JDK?

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

Install JDK 7u3.

Read full topic

item.title: Never seen client run error?
item.dc:creator: @tzej tzej
item.description:
@tzej wrote:

My run.batch edit looks like:

@echo off
title Client
java -Xmx300m client
pause

Registry key ‘Software\JavaSoft\Java Runtime Environment\CurrentVersion’
has value ‘1.7’, but ‘1.6’ is required.
Error: could not find java.dll
Error: could not find Java SE Runtime Environment.
Press any key to continue . . .

I have both jre 6/7 …

===========edit===============
I re-downloaded JAVA and I still have the same problem =.=

WTFFFFFFF :’[

Read full topic
